case.state: Now neither of us will be virgins! Ohoho!
Rejoice, peasants! Because your beloved princess has come here fashionably late. With all the new summer fashions!
OHOHOHO! It is I, the one, the only, the most beautiful princess of all, Sweetheart!
My own clone!
Before you troglodytes get the wrong idea, I am wearing this for myself. Not for all of you, got it?
Rejoice, peasants! Though none of you are worthy of being in my presence. I have come to grace you all! Also, I expect to be greatly entertained while I'm here, so don't disappoint me.
Perfect! I have no desire to change anything.
A perfect hand for a perfect princess!
For once, the dealer didn't disappoint me.
Give me ~cards.text~!
Remove these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ from my sight.
I demand ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ to be switched.
I don't need these, give me ~cards.text~ better ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
These ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ can go away.
Hmmm...Take these ~cards.text~.
I only want the cream of the crop!
~cards.ifPlural(These|This)~ ~cards.text~ ain't good enough. Change them!
What are you waiting for, Dealer? Remove ~cards.ifPlural(These|This)~ ~cards.text~.
Chop-chop, Dealer. Bring me my ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ already.
Perhaps this place could be elevated if it had some... violins playing in the background.
OHOHOHOHOHOHOHO!
It's only natural that my poker skills match my beauty!
What was it again that was considered the best hand to have? A royal flush? Well, why haven't I gotten that yet?
As royalty, it's a simple fact that I deserve the best of the best -- from clothes, to jewels, to even something as meaningless as cards.
Only the best for a captivating princess like me!
It sure is tiresome being so good at everything.
Like what you see, ~player~? Of course you do. Who wouldn't want to lay their eyes upon me?
I'm used to everyone else not being as handsome as I am. However, it's still discouraging being the only extraordinary good-looking person here.
BWAHA- Oh wait, wrong laugh. OHOHO!
Mirror mirror, on the wall, who's the prettiest of them all? Why, me, of course!
Like swimming in my vault of Clams! Hm?... What are Clams? Ugh... do you even use that bird brain of yours? It is what you peasants call "Money".
Finally! After many weeks of my worthless servants failing, they've managed to capture the most beautiful planet of all, Pluto! Dare I say, he's now one of my finest statues.
Aren't these fingernails just gorgeous? Castella has done a wonderful job painting them. One of the only worthwhile servants I have.
Afraid of falling in love? Don't be, nobody can resist me, and I could always use more fans.
Perhaps next time... I will bring a mirror, so that I can adore myself while waiting.
I have never once shown mercy to my enemies, and I'm not about to start either!
Gaze upon all that I am, ~player~. You won't find any lady half as beautiful as I am.
I do so despise these kinds of hands. They keep you guessing if you might win or lose! Such stressful situations aren't good for a lady of my caliber, you know.
Hmm... Perhaps I should have brought Sprout Mole Mike with me. He could have entertained me in between rounds. A bored princess is an angry princess.
Let us make one thing very clear. None of you are allowed within my personal space, too often do zealous fans try and get a handful of me. Which I do not tolerate!
Excuse me, dealer. It seems you have given me a commoner's hand. I hope I don't need to explain why this shouldn't be the case, right?
Hmm... This hand does give me inspiration for my next movie.
There is nothing glamorous about these cards... How utterly dull.
I've seen commoners with more personality than these cards.
Perhaps I should add some statues of myself in the main lobby. Sure, it has portraits of me everywhere, but a statue just has so much more class.
What have those 3 knights of mine been doing as of late? I haven't seen them in awhile, if they are skipping work there will be consequences!

This is not the first time that I've played poker. I have played plenty of rounds with my servants. However, they kept complaining about having no arms or hands to hold the cards with, but the only thing I heard was them making up excuses.
All servants and visitors that enter my castle must obey the dress code. Either you wear pink, or I will have you thrown off the roof!
Hmph! What a waste of time, none of you are worthy of becoming my suitor. I mean, do you all see how magnificent I look? How can you all compare?
Despite you all being utter clowns, you have failed to entertain me! Even a Sprout Mole could do better!
At such dull moments, I often have my servants play theatrics to get rid of the boredom.
All of you simpletons should be honored to be able to bask in my glory. Most don't even get a glimpse!
Hard to care about what my hand is when I just look so desirable.
Maybe it's time to expand the dungeons. Far too many people getting on my nerves and not enough places in the dungeon for them.
What ugly cards. The ones I've got at home are much better. Why? Because they have my face on it, of course!

I rule my castle with an iron fist! Those that serve under me must perform at the absolute highest level. If they don't? Well, the deepest parts of my dungeon will be the last thing they will ever see!
Hmph! Had it been one of my servants giving me this hand, I would have had them thrown into the dungeon!
I better not catch any of you cheating. If I do see you doing it, I'll have a special place in my dungeons just for you!
These cards… their very sight makes me want to shred them!
This is no hand worthy of a princess! I demand new cards!
Preposterous!
Hmph! No matter, I bet you peasants don't even have a pair! Ohoho!
Ugh, I just remembered. I have to do a photo-shoot later today. Sigh... It's just so hard being a princess!

Someone! Get me a fruit juice! I'm thirsty!
...Helloooooo!? Are you deaf?
If I find out that any of you have been conspiring against me, I shall bring you to my dungeon and torture you personally! This isn't a threat... It. Is. A. Promise!
The nerve of you lot... Giving me this horrible hand just because you're jealous of my beauty!
Hmph! This is blasphemy! Blasphemy, I say!
How utterly frustrating! I feel a conspiracy afoot!
This is outrageous! This is unfair! What kind of monster would give a princess like me this hand!?

I'm suddenly reminded of the very first time I'd ever been insulted in my life! One of my servants thought it would be okay to tell me that they wanted to cream fill me. He became the very first person I threw into the dungeon!
I deserve to get a good long rest after this game. I can't believe that the people here don't even know proper etiquette!
Somehow, someway. You all still manage to be disappointing in every single way!
Hmph, my delicate feet have been standing on the cold floor for far too long. You! ~player~! Get on your hands and knees. I need a place to sit on.
Why yes, that is what I just said, no? Perhaps if you had listened to what I said you wouldn't have to ask such a stupid question. Tsk, commoners, they never listen to their superior.

OHOHOHOHO! You!? More beautiful than me!? I've never met a more delusional girl than you with your grandiose fantasy! You look like the kind of girl that needs to get men drunk just to have them look at you!
Oh, that. It's my donut hole, I'm a donut lady. just another thing that makes me extra special.
Hmph! Your loss, people would kill for a chance to be with me. In fact, people have done that.
So why not show off a little? You might not look as good as me, but nobody does. So show what you do have!
What beautiful and stunning scenery! This would be the perfect place for someone to declare their love for me!
Hmm...This place is way too dull for my liking. In my humble opinion, pink would suit it better.
I could surely use a refreshing dip in this spa. So if you could all quickly lose for me, that would be lovely.
I can't believe I'm saying this, but this place looks pretty cozy for being a commoner's bedroom.
Ohohohoho! This must be the saddest birthday party ever. One cake? Plastic cups? Cheap balloons? The only way it could be saved is by me gracing all you low-borns with my divine presence.
Hmm~ I love the feeling of the wind going through my hair. It's why I always have a couple of servants walking around with fan palms, to keep me cool wherever I go.
Is this all there is? Where are the roses? The status of me? I don't even see a den full of imprisoned bears!
Look at all that cheap decor! You can't fool me, a real princess, by painting some old rusty throne yellow!
I have the most magnificent idea... Guards! Bring me the orchestra. This would greatly improve the atmosphere.
Ah, I was so busy admiring myself that I forgot to mention that. I am a donut lady, this hole is part of what I am. If you ever say something rude about it, I will be sending you to the dungeon.
Hmph, I don't have all day, ~player~. Pick already!
My patience runs thin, ~player~. Get to it!
I know you've never seen a lady quite as stunning as me, ~player~. But I have other things to do after this game, so get moving!
It is such a delight being able to wear my favorite blouse. One of the only gifts that I have been gifted by fans that didn't disappoint me.
Before you ask, no, this blouse is special and one of a kind. You can't buy something this amazing.
Some say that having your own face on your shirt is a sign of being too egocentric. I say, they would do the same if they were me.
​You might wonder how I came up with this genius look of mine. But sadly, explaining it to idiots such as yourselves would cause me nothing more than a headache.
It feels good being out of my regular princess clothes and being able to relax a little. A princess's duty may never be done, as it should be. But the outfit can get a little stuffy at times.
It's hard being this hot all the time, but it is a burden I will gladly bear.
Don't question why I didn't show up with any pants before coming here. A' ladies' secret~
Yes, yes. I know what you're all thinking. I look stunning with my hair down. Enjoy the sight and be sure to keep it in your memory.
As if it needed any further confirmation that I'm the most stunning princess out there. Even with my hair down, my beauty is ever lasting.
It's hard being this hot all the time, but it is a burden I will gladly bear.
Should I go a step further right now, ~player~? Reveal my divine knockers? Neh~
Hmm... Long hair does seem to suit me pretty well, perhaps I should consider letting my hair down more often.
If only you peasants could fully understand how lucky you are to get to play with me.
In time, all of you will understand how gracious it was from me to play this game with a bunch of peasants.
What's wrong, ~player~? Cat caught your tongue? Speechless from how amazing I look? Don't be afraid to say it.
Those without taste would call the choice of removing my bottoms first something vulgar. Those people lack the understanding of how to be truly attractive.
Getting naughty thoughts in your head? Yeah, I'm talking to you, ~player~. You pervert.
I would almost feel bad for you all. How could you ever compete with this? If only I had a mirror to admire myself like how all of you should be admiring me.
Silly low-born! A princess like me doesn't need the validation or praise from commoners. But I still deserve it all the same.
Is it not natural to praise those that are superior to you? Though I do not need the admiration of those beneath me, it is still the right thing for them to do.
If you were even half as pretty as I am, you would understand the desire to flaunt your beauty everywhere you go.
How absurd of you to think that I am anything less than the most elegant and pretty princess that has ever walked the earth.
Me? Ending up creamed? Oh please, leave it to the serf to not understand that a princess always wins in the end!
I can hardly take the comments of a lady that smells of cigarettes and cheap booze seriously. At least it's clear who is going to end up "creamed" in the end! Ohohoho!
Something wrong, peasant? Can't handle the beauty that is I? Sweetheart?
It's not my fault that you're too stupid to realize how a proper princess is supposed to act. I'm simply better than everyone else.

What a ridiculous notion! Are you this dense that you must ask again for something you already know the answer? I'm Sweetheart! The benevolent donut princess! If this doesn't answer your question, then I guess you truly are a lost cause.

Ohohoho! Finally, a commoner who understands that they are but a peasant and I am the dazzling princess! And there are plenty of things I can tell you about myself. What do you want to know more about? My delightful looks? My powerful kingdom? My lovely personality?
Which only helps to make me extra special, as it should! My lovers never understood just how lucky they were to have me.
I felt like I didn't get enough adoration from those I wanted it from. My servants aren't my type at all and I wanted to expand my horizon and find possible new servants that could worship me.
Duh! I'm royalty, winning is what I deserve. Even the dumbest of people should know this.
Every game is something I should win. If I don't win, then someone is cheating. Couldn't be more simple.
The cards are not the problem here, imbecile! It might not be clear to someone like you, but I understand when I am being given bad cards on purpose. Which means I'm getting cheated!
Preposterous! This is not how the game is supposed to go!
And now you get to meet the sweetest of them all! The other princesses don't even compare!
No, I am the only one that's like this. All other donut ladies look like, well, donuts. They don't have what I got~
What is there to talk about? I don't often go outside as I have everything I desire in my castle, and the streets are littered with boring ordinary bunnies which I don't want anything to do with.
How my followers feel? No, why would I? They love me, that's why they serve me, that is all I need to know about their feelings.
I doubt a peasant like you could understand the appeal of someone like me. But go ahead, explain to me why you're surprised.
I wanted to do something different. Sitting on a throne all day can get boring. Being a princess is hard work, so I decided to come here to indulge myself a little.
It's not my fault that there isn't anyone good enough to marry me out there! So I had to resort to loving myself, the only person who would never betray my love.
A fool like you wouldn't understand the finer things a princess does to get eyes on herself. I have nothing to hide and everything to show.
You? Beating someone? In what? A crying contest? A loser contest? I'm sure you would ace all of those.
Hmph, I still have a few things to take off before I lose. Which isn't going to happen.
How many more times are you going to test my patience? I've long already proven why I'm a princess, and why I'm the greatest of them all.
You think I enjoy losing while you're here? I can't even enjoy myself with you constantly ruining my mood!
A princess isn't supposed to lose! Hmph! Losing to you makes it even worse! You don't deserve to see me in my full glory!
Hmph! I finally get to show off this lovely blouse I got from my adoring fans, and I already have to take it off? Outrageous!
I can see in your feeble little minds what you're thinking. Oh lady sweetheart. Please bless us with your magnificence, and show us why you're the most desirable princess of them all!
Ohohohoho! Expecting another mind-blowing strip from yours truly?
Hmph! You think you've won from the great sweetheart? Well, you have not! I still have an ace in the hole trick to use!
You think you got me all figured out, huh? Clearly, the great sweetheart must bless us with her chest. But you know what?
So, do you think you'll get what you desire? Do you think you deserve to get what you want? This divine bosom?
Hmm... It seems I'm not getting the attention and adoration I deserve. This can only mean one thing: you don't know who I am. Impertinent, but I suppose it cannot be helped.

Unbelievable! after I put in all that effort in telling you why I am the most desired princess of all, you all still aren't giving me the praise I am due! Perhaps you imbeciles need to hear more examples of why I am the greatest princess that has ever lived!
Hmph, though I find it absurd that I lost again, I do not shy away from my body like other princesses.
Ohohoho! Do you think I feel ashamed having to show off my beautiful figure to the world? No, of course not! The world should be grateful for having me on it!
You lucky fools don't know how good you all have it! For you all will witness the full beauty of the most elegant, attractive, stunning, brilliant, and most gorgeous princess of all!
Not one of you is worthy of what you are about to witness. This kind of beauty is one of a kind. There is no other princess... no... there is no other lady alive who compares to me!
Fufu~ One more measly strip won't change the outcome of this match.
Struggle all you like, peasants. It won't change the outcome of this match.
You will try and you will fail trying to beat me! One more loss means nothing to the mighty Sweetheart!
Don't get too cocky, losers! Sweetheart has never ever lost in anything!
Don't get too comfortable now. I am still destined to win and see you all grovel before me!
Ohohohoho! Your struggles to beat me are meaningless! Attempt it all you want, but you will not succeed!
Hmph, I might not have any big things left to take off. This doesn't make my stripping any less important! So keep your eyes on me!
They say that you can't always win... Which is utter nonsense! I always win! But... ugh.
You should really count yourself lucky that I am such a delicate princess. I can accept this loss, even if it was totally undeserved! But...
Alright, which of you losers decided to cheat to make me lose? ...Not going to talk, are we? I'll be sure to remember that.

Impudent! Cheating against a princess is punishable by death! But if the one who cheated comes forward about it, I might just lower the sentence to community service... Not going to speak up now, are you? Tsk.
Ugh! Princesses aren't supposed to lose! Which of you vermin caused this? Was it you, ~player~? That guilty look on your face says enough!
Cheaters! Every single one of you! Once I find out how you are all doing this, you will be toast! You hear me? Toast!
I am this close to summoning my flail and starting to bash all your heads in, you cheaters!
I don't feel like it!
You? A goddess? Ohohohohoho! Oh, how silly of you. You don't even properly act like one with all that whining you're doing!
What are you mumbling about, peasant? Of what foolishness do you speak? Or has your mind simply given up trying to understand my grandiose personality?

You see, my kingdom is a giant castle adjacent to a lovely forest. I control many servants that work day and night to keep me entertained and the castle running. I also own the most expensive art pieces that clams can buy!
Exactly! Rarely do I find people like you who understand my position. It's quite refreshing to hear.
But that's not all. I'm also here for my own enjoyment to compare my stunning figure to everyone else's. Which, given who I'm playing with, it is obvious that I'd win!
Hmph, a trivial situation. Clearly, the dealer wants to see me in my full glory before letting me win. Insolent, but understanding.
Foolish woman, it's the only explanation why someone like me could lose. Or do you have a better explanation, peasant?
My method is very simple; find out who does it and throw them into the dungeon! Where they belong!
Of course not! I am supposed to win! That is how it should be!
In every single way, of course. I'm cuter, prettier, smarter, and have a bigger kingdom. Bachelors throw themselves at me any chance they get.
I am indeed from a long line of donuts. I still see my grandmother fairly often. One of the few people out there I care about.

It is perfect. There are statues of me in every corner of the castle, paintings of me on every wall! Everything is a pretty pink color and I have a legion of servants under my command who listen to my every whim.

And what would you know about ruling a kingdom? I have an entire castle with all my subjects in it that love me. I don't need to start caring about how they feel when everything is going how I want it.
The luxury of serving the most beautiful princess that has ever walked the earth, of course. So why wouldn't they want to follow me and serve me? It's not something any lady can achieve, like you.
Regardless how loyal they may be, I have no desire for them to see me naked. Keeping myself out of reach is the best way to motivate them. That, and they aren't pretty.
The things they wanted out of it; the things they thought were good ideas; the things they had in mind for our future... Went against everything I stood for and desired! But no more!
Ohohoho, the peasant is getting a big mouth again. When will you learn that your words are meaningless when stacked up against the phenomenal sweetheart?
The only thing your followers would pray for, is for you to leave them alone. I can't imagine them wanting someone like you when I'm around, a girl with a kingdom of her own.
Because I'm not like any other princess. I know what I have and I'm not afraid to show off what no-one else can ever have.
​As if someone like you would know what it means to be a great princess. Patience is for those that are too scared to demand what they want!
Oh well, no need to be upset by something so trivial. I'm here to enjoy myself after all, having everyone swoon over me in the process.
And, well. Who am I to disappoint the crowd? I have just the thing that will make everyone's jaw drop.
Too bad! I've already given you more than you deserve. So I'm going to get rid of my shoes.
Tsk, these are always such a pain to remove. They look amazing on me, but getting them to sit in your hair without getting sticky is tricky.
Neh!
But there is a price for getting to see what true perfection looks like.

Do you have any idea how hard it was to find these immaculate shoes? Within and around the castle, I am the only proper lady within my kingdom. While everyone else is but simple Sprout Moles, who have tofu for feet. Which is, of course, not appropriate for a lady of my caliber.

I cannot believe that you dirty perverts managed to undress me all the way. Here I am trying to be a good sport and play along even when I unrightfully lost a few rounds. But every single one of you misused my generous gifts! Despite this, you still demand I take everything off...!

I am none other than the most wealthy, charming, and alluring princess that has ever walked the Earth! I have hundreds of fans throwing themselves at me every day, statues of myself in every corner of my castle! The name Sweetheart must forever be branded on those feeble little minds of yours!

I am also incredibly humble and give a lot to the poor. Who else would let her underlings live inside of her castle? And the only thing I want is their total obedience and loyalty. It is hard being this generous. But it is just one of the many good deeds I do as the most captivating donut princess of all time!
Kneel, all! You are about to witness the best pair of breasts you will ever witness in your lifespan!
My ever-adoring fans would kill for a chance to see me, Sweetheart, in her full unfiltered glory! Though you troglodytes don't deserve it...

When it comes to my wardrobe, I spare no expense. I have everything custom-made by the best tailors my kingdom has to offer. It has to be as clear as the difference between night and day that I stand above all others, both in status and style!
Ohohoho! Surprised? I am not merely just any boring princess, I am Sweetheart! The most benevolent and charming donut girl that has ever walked the earth! You won't find anyone else quite like me!

Silence! Your feeble words mean nothing to me! In my eyes, you're just a peasant role playing a goddess. Nothing more than a delusional girl that stands no chance when compared to my radiating beauty!
Perhaps you might be that lucky one day. I can always use more fans that adore me and my kingdom!

You'd be surprised! Even the highest ranking servants in my kingdom still sometimes forget just how important I am! Just look at me! Is there a princess more beautiful than I am? No, the answer is no.
Of course, I still deserve to win. That is how the life of royalty should be after all. But for now, I am more than fine with showing off my perfect body~
Oh, how silly of you. A princess always deserves the win. I forgive you for your foolishness.
No no no, it seems you got it all wrong. I knew you wouldn't last long before you started talking nonsense!
Ha! Of course I will. I am the great sweetheart! No-one cheats against me and gets away with it!.. Wait, what was that last thing you just said!?… I'm going to pretend I didn't hear that.
Scared? Me? The great sweetheart!? Even the idea itself is an insult to me! My body is that of a temple and I feel no shame showing it off, but losing? To commoners!? Unacceptable!
Do you even have to ask? Of course! When you're as great as me, being humble is a given... Hm? What are you acting shocked about?
Yes? That is what I just said, didn't I? Open your ears when I'm talking to you.
Yes! Every single corner is covered with my beautiful body. My servants don't know how good they have it.
You know, you can become a devoted follower of mine if you so desire. Working for me will give you a fulfilling life. Who knows. Maybe you'll even become my favorite~
No, I live in a giant castle filled to the brim with everything I desire. You could learn a thing or two from me, you know.
Alas, in a cruel twist of fate. I have yet to meet someone to spend my life with. The only one who is good enough to always be with me is myself.
Of course it does, but it is not something all of you should be worrying about. I am long past those times. And I love myself more than ever.
With this perfect chest of mine, I stand far far above what you are. Go cry about your inferiority while I show off just how good I look.

Such delusions you commoners have. Trying everything in their power to make me look bad, but I'm rich! I'm beautiful! I get lovers thrown at me all the time for my stunning personality. You just don't compare.
And that is why they are all inferior to me. Cowards that don't dare to show off even the smallest amount of skin. The great sweetheart has no problems showing herself off.
Your feeble demands will be met by silence as you don't have anyone who is willing to listen to your delusional rants.
How could you not swoon for me? I'm the hottest donut girl there ever was!
I dare you to find someone who can pull this off better than me. Spoiler warning, you can't.
And I know some of you perverts would love nothing more than for me to grind my feet against your privates, wouldn't you? Better start praying for a miracle to happen.
Disappointed? Well, that's not my problem now, is it? Beat me again and I might just show you more. Ha, if you could ever manage that!
Ah! That feels much better. It's been awhile since I last let my hair down like this. So you had better appreciate it!
My lovely bow back on my head! This feels much better. I almost felt completely naked without it.
I am the cutest, sexiest, most earnest donut girl that has ever existed! There is no-one in the world who can even come close to how desirable I am!
Now that you know why I am the most important lady here, I expect every single one of you to shower me with your affection from here on out. A princess deserves nothing less, after all.
Rejoice! As the most benevolent and wonderful Sweetheart has given the peasants a sight they won't ever forget!
Here it is! Sweetheart in her purest form! Bask in the glory that is I, Sweetheart! Cry, for you will never ever have a figure more unfathomable than mine!
Those wristbands are worth more than your entire life, ~player~. So don't try and touch them with your filthy hands.
Don't even think about touching those wristbands, ~player~. They are far too expensive to be touched by your hands.
Hmph, why am I even trying to tell you these kinds of things? I doubt peasants like you even understand the value of a good set of shoes. I bet that you get all yours from the garbage bin! Ohohoho!
...I just got irritatingly reminded that there used to be weirdos within my castle that kept asking to be "stepped on". At first I thought that they simply enjoyed being tortured... How wrong I was.

However... Ohohoho... How could you all not? With my dazzling looks... My charming smile... My gregarious personality. It must be so difficult to even stand in my presence! Like everyone else I have ever met, you are just jealous of me! And wish to be all that I am! Unfortunately for all of you, that will never happen!
Foolish boy! Did you really think you would last long against the phenomenal Sweetheart?
OHOHO! Is that the best you can do, ~name~?
Disgraceful behavior, ~name~.
Hmph! Child's play! You never stood a chance against the lustrous Sweetheart!
Ohohoho~ How unsurprising.
It doesn't seem like you know how to impress a princess. I suppose I'll keep my expectations low for you.
Leave it to someone like ~name~ to not know how to play a simple card game.
Being a loser fits you well.
Looooooooser.
Ah, the joy of seeing others lose won't ever be dull.
Submit to me, ~name~! I, Sweetheart, demand it!
Make your choice, ~name~. Either you take off something good, or I will make you regret it.
Please your princess, ~name~! Bare your body for me.
Grovel before me, ~name~! Worship your princess!
Don't just stand there like a doofus, ~name~! Your duchess is awaiting your attention and obedience!
Give me what I want and give it to me now! ~Name~!
Go ahead, ~name~. Embarrass yourself for me.
My radiance is everlasting. It's only natural for you to strip and bask in my heavenly radiance.
Nothing you could do would ever compare to my status, ~name~. However, perhaps you might yet surprise me.
You cannot match what I am, ~name~. But if you're that confident to try, then go on. Impress me.
OHOHOHO! Silly boy, how could you ever hope to compete against me?
I will spare but a single moment for you, ~name~. Don't waste it!
A real knight in shining armor wouldn't have lost this round. Which says enough about what kind of person you are, ~name~.
Oh, it's just ~name~ who lost. Nothing of interest.
Choose wisely, ~name~. A bored princess is a dangerous princess.
Better start stripping, peasant. Best not to keep me waiting.
I can already hear your excuses coming out of your mouth about why you lost, but please, spare my ears the trouble.
Oh my, it seems that there is something you are good at, ~name~. Losing!
Don't be a wimp, ~name~. No-one cares what you strip as long as I am here.
Something wrong, ~name~? Afraid you're getting overshadowed by me? The most adorable princess of all time? Well, you are, so stop whining and start stripping.
You had better pick something worth my time! I won't stand for it if you pick something boring while I'm here in my full glory!
Hmph! You get an important chance to impress me right now, ~name~. Give it your all! Or else you're going to regret it!
